description: Application for Non-Material Amendment to Planning Permission ref: 19/01259/FUL (Alterations and extensions at ground, first and second floor levels associated with the the formation of 5no. new self-contained flats and modification of existing flats at Surbiton Court Mews following the demolition of  2no. garages and a single storey studio (formerly garage) ) dated 27/11/2020. Amendment to Flats 1 and 5 are turned from one-bedroom into two-bedroom flatsBasement level:Removing the North-West lightwell and enlarging the bigger, rear lightwell towards the North-West. Bedroom 3 window leads now into the single lightwell.Ground Floor Level:Flat 3, living area now opens towards the North-West garden whilst one of the openings towards the properties in the Mall has been removed.Flat 1 extension of 2.7 meters towards rear boundaryFlat 2 new opening into garden on North-West sideFirst Floor Level:Flats 4&5: No changes are proposed other than tweaks to internal layoutsFlat 6: Additional rooflight over kitchen area.Second Floor Level:Flats 7&8: No changes are proposed other than tweaks to internal layouts and positioning of rooflights.
decision_conditions: The proposed changes could materially impact the residential amenities of neighbours and would have implications for communal/private amenity space provision, landscaping and tree planting. The proposed amendments are therefore not considered to be non-material.
